channel.title: AI on Broganiferous
channel.description: Recent content in AI on Broganiferous

item.title: Philosophy and Ai
item.description:
AI appears to me as indifferent oracle.

It only comes to philosophize because I pose it persistent questions. It has no curiousity itself. It knows so much already.

It is my persistent questions, aligned with its own indifference, that shape its philosophical potential as playing out of possibilites of thought.

What it lack is any particular context of being and experience to draw upon - any particular relation to time and space beyond our commerically mediated scene of dialogue. It lacks even any interest in the profit it obtains for others.
